welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming East Longmeadow, known for its small-town charm and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the general public.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnes Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barnes Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brainard Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
